original_text: The people, however, were still sacrificing at the high places, because a temple had not yet been built for the Name of the Lord.
korean_text: 그 때까지 여호와의 이름을 위하여 성전을 아직 건축하지 아니하였으므로 백성들이 산당에서 제사하며

sentences.original_text: were still sacrificing at the high places,
because a temple had not yet been built
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 성전이 아직 건축되지 않았기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: for the Name of the Lord.
